name: A Letter From the Bank
description:
'A Letter From the Bank' 

is an 80s style Text Adventure Game specifically designed for English language learners. Suitable for teens and up.  It is atmospheric and trains your text comprehension.

Also, it looks and plays great on mobile devices!

Features for English language learners: 

^ Upper-intermediate vocabulary and text comprehension

 ^ 'Clean' grammar

^ Helpfully color coded text interface

Features for everybody: 

^ 20+ locations

^ Hand-drawn background graphics!

^ Multiple, optional mysteries to uncover! 

^'Score' feature to show your progress.

^ One extra Cool hidden Treasure to hunt for!

^ Eerie atmosphere (You can look  the word up if you don't already know)

Made in Adventuron 

Visit Adventuron.io to learn how to build Text Adventure Games like this one.

Many thanks to the Adventuron community as well.
